metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3831 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The telephony component in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2,5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-08-01 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (device crash) via a NITZ time value of2038-01-19 or later that is mishandled by the system clock, aka internalbug 29083635, related to a "Year 2038 problem."

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
